nodes.name: BaseMath

nodes.documentation: @dev Getter function since constants can't be read directly from libraries.
nodes.name: base

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies a value by a base value (result is rounded down).
nodes.name: baseMul
baseDivMul

nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies a value by a base value (result is rounded up).
nodes.name: baseMulRoundUp

nodes.documentation: @dev Divide a value by a base value (result is rounded down).
nodes.name: baseDiv

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns a base value representing the reciprocal of another base value (result is
 rounded down).
nodes.name: baseReciprocal
